Title: 19 Down... (1)
Plot: When the team discovers a connection between a new murder and a serial killer, Grissom secretly joins the class of a criminal pathologist to help crack the case.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Marc Vann, Archie Kao, Alex Carter, Sheeri Rappaport, Bill Irwin, Amy Aquino, Shane Woodson, Larry Sullivan, Maury Sterling
